title: What is the future of the human race ? - Quora

response.answer_text: No-one will ever need to access more than 640 Kb of computer memory.The world may need about 4 or 5 computers eventually.The 20th century belongs to Canada.The NDP will win the 2015 Federal election in Canada and the Liberals will try to find a way to survive.Those are all the predictions about the future of the human race I can think of right now, but they are as accurate as any.

In this world of endless uncertainities, no one can tell for sure the future of human race, we can only predict, hope for,or try to acheive a specific future No one can tell you with 100% surity about their own future....let alone the whole human race... What we can focus upon is present and many great minds are working for the development of the human race far beyond our imagination.Ofcourse some people and their destructive ideas are a threat to humanity but the pace of development is always above destruction Otherwise we wont be here having this discussion...right ?? So lets jut hope for a good future while working hard in present.

I am afraid that as a direct result of climate change, civilization all over the world will fail by 2030… no government will be able to hold itself together because of pressures brought on mainly by hunger. As the planet warms, many things will cut into food production. By 2050, there will be more plastic in the oceans than fish by weight. By around that time, I expect the last human to become extinct. I am sorry to report that these are my sincerely held beliefs.

After few thousands of years, computers would be more powerful. Micro-organisms will be resistant to all antibiotics and they will be evolving even stronger. Our immune system and health condition would deteriorate due to chemicals we eat and lifestyle. Causes can be endless, but the race would definitely extinct somehow. We are no different than dinosaurs.
